Delivery Information
Local Stockists and Distributors

Blanket Order Book Service

The Blanket Order Book Service offers a convenient and reliable means to obtain all English-language IMF titles automatically upon publication with a 10 percent discount applied to each shipment.

Upon receipt of your order, we will begin shipping all new English titles, in paperback editions, unless only hardcover is produced. Also, you will automatically receive all complimentary publications as they become available. Delivery by surface mail is free of charge. You may elect faster delivery, the cost of which will be added to your invoice. Be sure to indicate your purchase order number if you wish this to appear on mailing labels and invoices. (Titles priced above $50.00 will not be shipped automatically. We will notify you and request confirmation of your interest.)

You may cancel this service at any time by notifying us in writing.

PLEASE NOTE

The Blanket Order Book Service does not include subscription periodicals or yearbook issues associated with those subscriptions such as all statistical publications, IMF Staff Country Reports, Working Papers, IMF Staff Papers, IMF Survey, and Papers on Policy Discussion Papers.
